Identification_Area.title: Korea Pathfinder Lunar Orbiter SPICE Archive Description

Citation_Information.description: This document provides a comprehensive description of the Korea Pathfinder Lunar Orbiter SPICE kernel archive containing observation geometry and other ancillary data in the form of SPICE System kernel files for the Korea Pathfinder Lunar Orbiter Spacecraft spacecraft and its instruments and targets. It describes the archive directory structure, kernels included in the archive, their naming conventions, and provides pointers to the SPICE software and documentation.
